metadata.description: User name for the Virtual Machine.
SSH rsa public key file as a string.

resources.comments: This is the definition of a RouteTable specific to each Subnet
resources.name: [variables('Networking_Deployment').routetable1]

resources.comments: This is the definition of a Route within the RouteTable
resources.name: [concat(variables('Networking_Deployment').routetable1, '/', variables('Networking_Deployment').routename1)]

resources.comments: This is the definition of a RouteTable specific to each Subnet
resources.name: [variables('Networking_Deployment').routetable2]

resources.comments: This is the definition of a Route within the RouteTable
resources.name: [concat(variables('Networking_Deployment').routetable2, '/', variables('Networking_Deployment').routename2)]
